46 struct ShaderInputInfo {
47 
48  //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
51 
52  enum class InputType {
53  kNone = -1,
54  kUniform,
55  kIn,
56  kOut,
57  BufferField
58  };
59 
61  static bool IsValidGLType(int typeInt);
62 
63  enum class PrecisionQualifier {
64  kNone = -1,
65  kHigh,
66  kMedium,
67  kLow
68  };
69 
70  enum ShaderInputFlag {
71  kIsArray = 1 << 0,
72  kInBlockOrBuffer = 1 << 1
73  };
74 
76 
77  //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
80 
81  ShaderInputInfo();
82  ShaderInputInfo(const ShaderInputInfo& info);
83  ShaderInputInfo(const GString& name, const ShaderVariableType& type, InputType inputType);
84  ShaderInputInfo(const GString& name, const ShaderVariableType& type, InputType inputType, bool isArray);
85  ShaderInputInfo(const GString& name, const ShaderVariableType& type, InputType inputType, bool isArray, int id);
86  ~ShaderInputInfo();
87 
89 
90  //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
93  bool isArray() const { return m_flags.testFlag(kIsArray); }
94  bool inBlockOrBuffer() const { return m_flags.testFlag(kInBlockOrBuffer); }
95 
96  const GString& name() const { return m_name; }
97 
99 
100  //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
103 
105  QString asGLSL() const;
106 
108 
109  //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
112 
113  GString m_name;
114  //QString m_typeStr = ""; // variable type in glsl, e.g. vec3, vec2, float
115  ShaderVariableType m_variableType = ShaderVariableType::kNone; // GLSL type of uniform, supports GL_UNIFORM, GL_PROGRAM_INPUT, GL_PROGRAM_OUTPUT, GL_TRANSFORM_FEEDBACK_VARYING, GL_BUFFER_VARIABLE
116  std::type_index m_variableCType; // C++ type info for the uniform
117  QString m_variableTypeStr; // Null unless custom type
118  InputType m_inputType = InputType::kNone;
119  QFlags<ShaderInputFlag> m_flags; // whether the uniform is an array or not
120  int m_uniformID = -1; // ID (location) to be set when bound to a shader
121  int m_localIndex = -1; // Index of the uniform in the m_uniforms vector of corresponding ShaderProgram object
122  int m_arraySize = -1;
123  PrecisionQualifier m_precision = PrecisionQualifier::kNone;
124 
126 
127 private:
128 };
129 
133 struct ShaderBufferInfo {
134 
136  QString asGLSL() const;
137 
138  QString m_name; // Name of the buffer (internally)
139  QString m_variableName; // Name of buffer for use as glsl variable, e.g. lightBuffer.data
140  GL::BufferMemoryQualifier m_memoryQualifier = GL::BufferMemoryQualifier::kNone;
141  GL::BufferBlockType m_bufferType = GL::BufferBlockType::kShaderStorage;
142  GL::ShaderBlockLayout m_blockLayout = GL::ShaderBlockLayout::kStd140;
143  int m_bufferBinding = -1; // the index of the buffer binding point associated with the active shader storage block
144  unsigned long m_bufferDataSize = 0; // the minimum size in bytes to hold active variables
145  size_t m_numActiveVariables = 0; // the number of active variables associated with the block
146  std::vector<ShaderInputInfo> m_fields; // Info about fields of buffer
147 };
148 
152 struct ShaderStruct {
153  QString m_name;
154  std::vector<ShaderInputInfo> m_fields;
155 };
156 
160 struct ShaderFunction {
161 
162  GString m_name; // Name of the functiion
163  ShaderVariableType m_returnType; // Return type of the function
164  GString m_definition; // The entire definition of the function
165  GString m_definitionStart; // The beginning of the function definition
166  GString m_body; // The body of the function (contents of brackets)
167 };

191 class Shader : public rev::Object, public Nameable, public Loadable{
192 public:
193  //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
196 
198  static GString s_worldMatrixUniformName;
199 
200 
201  enum ShaderFlags
202  {
203  kVertexFlag = 0x0001,
204  kFragmentFlag = 0x0002,
205  kGeometryFlag = 0x0004, // (requires OpenGL >= 4.0 or OpenGL ES >= 3.2).
206  kTessellationControlFlag = 0x0008, // (requires OpenGL >= 4.0 or OpenGL ES >= 3.2).
207  kTessellationEvaluationFlag = 0x0010, // (requires OpenGL >= 4.0 or OpenGL ES >= 3.2).
208  kComputeFlag = 0x0020 // (requires OpenGL >= 4.3 or OpenGL ES >= 3.1).
209  };
210 
211  enum class ShaderType
212  {
213  kVertex = 0,
214  kFragment = 1,
215  kGeometry = 2, // (requires OpenGL >= 4.0 or OpenGL ES >= 3.2).
216  kCompute = 3, // (requires OpenGL >= 4.3 or OpenGL ES >= 3.1).
217  kTessellationControl = 4, // (requires OpenGL >= 4.0 or OpenGL ES >= 3.2).
218  kTessellationEvaluation = 5 // (requires OpenGL >= 4.0 or OpenGL ES >= 3.2).
219  };
220 
225  static std::vector<int>& shaderTypeToGLMap() { return s_shaderTypeToGLMap; }

388  // Regex for a uniform: uniform[\s\t\n\r]*[\w\d]+[\s\t\n\r]*[\w\d]+
389  // Regex for a layout block: layout[\s\t\n\r]*\([\w\d]+\)[\s\t\n\r]*uniform[\s\t\n\r]+[\w\d]+[\s\t\n\r]*[\s\t\n\r]*\{([\w\d\s\t\n\r;\/\,]*)\}
390  // Regex for a struct: struct[\s\t\n\r]*[\w\d]+[\s\t\n\r]*\{([\w\s\d\t\n\r;\/\,]*)\}
391  static QString UNIFORM_REGEX;
392  static QString STRUCT_REGEX;
393  static QString UNIFORM_BUFFER_REGEX;
394  static QString BUFFER_REGEX;
395  static QString COMMENT_REGEX;
396  static QString DEFINE_REGEX;
397  static QString FUNCTION_START_REGEX;
398  static QString OUT_SHADER_REGEX; // e.g., out vec4 fcolor;
399  static QString IN_SHADER_REGEX; // e.g., in vec2 texCoords;
